info.description: Allows the viewing and management of the Rights holdings
info.title: Holdigs Buy Sell Rights APIs

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

sellBuyOptionDescription.description: The description of the sell/buy Option

sellBuyOptionNo.description: Option number is mapped from tag 13A in Option details sequence

sellBuySec.description: Denotes the rights security number for which there is an option to sell or buy rights

optionReplyByDate.description: The CA cut-off date to choose a particular option.

tradeFromDate.description: Specifies the Start date of action (Trading) period for the option

tradeToDate.description: Specifies the End date of action (Trading) period for the option

sellBuyQuantity.description: The quantity of rights being sold or underlying security or rights security being purchased

price.description: The Price at which the NOMINAL.AMOUNT of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

tradeDate.description: The trade date of the contract

considAmount.description: The consideration amount to be received or paid in the event currency (Quantity * Price).

tradeReference.description: The Id of the SEC.TRADE generated

depositoryId.description: The identifier of the depository. Must be a customerSecurity of type depository.

subAccount.description: The sub-account that the security position is held in.

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

qualifyingHolding.description: The Portfolio's holding in the original security

netNominal.description: Denotes the sum of the Quantity

generateInstruction.description: Specifies whether MT565 has to be generated

MT566Confirmation.description: Specifies whether the transaction status will be updated based on the incoming MT 566 confirmation

MT566Ref.description: When set to processed, SEC.TRADE is created in authorized state and the reference number is updated once the MT566 confirmation is received

status.description: Get a detail status of the specified service/services

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
